recommendations: Sanjana Choksi “Kunal is a direct supervisor and manager to me at Upsurge.club. He pushed me and made me take up challenges like nobody else. Coming from a corporate, I was used to following an SOP for each task, but Kunal preferred we think out-of-the-box and bring creativity in every little task we performed. He created a safe space for us where we could be open about our challenges and problems. I learnt from him a great deal of how to lead discussions with industry experts, further my knowledge in finance and make sure I was able to take charge of work when he was not around. ”

Khushi Khemka “A critical thinker with a solid vision. That's how I would describe Kunal bhaiya. He is the most efficient, passionate & coolest person to work with. His ability to multi-task and manage so many things simultaneously with a calm mindset still awes me. It seems like Getting shit done comes to him naturally:) In the duration of a 3-month internship as a project manager at Valuationary, I've understood one thing that any intern would be lucky to work & learn with him.”

honors_and_awards.title: Academic Achievements - Sri Venkateswara College 1st and 2nd year
honors_and_awards.description: I stood 2nd in both my first year as well as the second year of my Bachelors Program. I scored 100/100 in the paper of Intermediate Microeconomics-1, 97/100 in the paper of Introductory Econometrics, 97/100 in the paper of Algebra and Calculus-1. I had an aggregate percentage of 82 for all 6 semesters.

honors_and_awards.title: Academic Achievements - J.H. Ambani School, class 12.
honors_and_awards.description: I was issued certificates from school for scoring the highest marks in Mathematics and Economics in class 12 and for being third overall. I scored 99/100 in Mathematics and 98/100 in Economics.

honors_and_awards.title: Computer Wizard Award
honors_and_awards.description: I was awarded the Computer Wizard award from the school in order to appreciate my skills in PowerPoint Presentation making and Videography & Video Editing. I have represented school at various district and state level competitions in documentary movie making and ppt competitions.
